'''A Plea to the Rocks''' is the twenty-fourth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)]]''. The song was sung by [[Sophia Nomvete]] as the [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] [[Disa]].
